title: Way to watch high elo players?
body: As the title says, before we had replay.gg and other sites that were letting us watch our and other peoples games. I want to watch Thor LFT and other high elo Dravens to improve but it seems like there isn't a way. Is there anyone that knows site that gives replays?

replies.body: I don't have a good website to search ELO's, but I do have this handy [**reddit convo**](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/62lm8h/list_of_onetrick_pony_youtube_channels/?st=j58pctqm&sh=e3dab20f)! That's got a list of some popular streamers divided up by champion, and you could also peruse Twitch (which you can filter League streams by champions now).
Go on Op.gg and type the player you wanna look for and download the game you wanna watch :)
